attributes.action: Stop the sales of needles and citric acid powder in pharmacies
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to make it illegal for pharmacies to sell needles or citric acid powder to drug addicts- because drugs makes holes in the body and kill people- Danniella Westbrooks nose. Drug addicts should go directly to to the doctor or hospital.
Anyway taking drugs is illegal so the pharmacists are being involved in an illegal act which is wrong.
